revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=EnGenius |model=ESR900 |revision=(0.20 LFP) v1.1 |series=N900 |upc=655216006362 |asin=B00H93M554 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |fcc_date=06/11/2013 |fcc_id=A8JESR900 |ic_id=10103A-ESR900 |pcb_id=7016A066600g |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9558 |cpu1_cspeed=720 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16DG-AC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9558 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9580 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327N |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz High-Power High-Gain Power Amplifier;Silicon Storage Technology;SST12LP15A;;3;,,, 3A 23V Step-Down Converter;M3Tek;IT76630M;;1; |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.0; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, (18.06) |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=EnGeniusXXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^EnGenius[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=88:DC:96 |oui_eth=88:DC:96 }} {{TagLine|Dual Band Wireless N900 Xtra Range Router}} :''with Gigabit, USB and EnShare'' {{â€¢}} [http://www.engeniustech.com/home-networking/routers/16738-esr900 Product page]
"ESR900-0.20 LFP" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The Flash chip appears to be a [[Macronix]] MX25L12845EMI-10G.
The 2.4GHz radio is using three [[SST]] ([[Microchip]]) SST12LP154 PA ICs. :The default SSID pattern (for both bands?) may be '''EnGeniusXXXXXX'''.
The power adapter shown in the FCC external photos is a ''Shenzhen Gongjin Electronics'' ([[SGE]]) :S24B12-120A150-04 (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.7A max. -> 12VDC, 1.5A).
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9558 @720MHz :[[MIPS 74Kc]] 802.11bgn (3T3R) WiSoC *Storage: [[Macronix]] 16MB (NOR) Flash *Memory: [[Nanya]] 128MB (DDR2) SDRAM *Wi-Fi: [[QCA]] QCA9558 2.4GHz (802.11bgn) :[[Atheros]] AR9580 5GHz (802.11an) *Network: 5x Gigabit Ethernet ports *Power: 12V/1.5A via barrel
==Images== <gallery> File:EnGenius ESR900 Top.jpeg|Board top File:EnGenius ESR900 Bottom.jpeg|Board bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
